articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Moranbong Band
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju, watched the performance given by the Moranbong Band at April 25 House of Culture on Mar. 22.
					 Put on the stage were diverse numbers such as female chorus "The People's Joy", female duet and pangchang  "Our Father", female solo and pangchang "A Song of a Rich Haul of Fish", light music "Footsteps of a Soldier".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the exploits Kim Jong Un has performed by leading the showdown with the U.S. to victory and thereby protecting the destiny of the country and nation.
					
					 They powerfully demonstrated that no force on earth will stop our army and people from advancing as there is the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army and the might of the harmonious whole of all service personnel and the people.
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 As the performance was over, he warmly waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the audience.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Ki Nam, Pak To Chun, Kim Phyong Hae, Han Kwang Sang, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Jae Il, Kim Pyong Ho, Kim Yo Jong, and service personnel of the KPA.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation Sunday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun. It is led by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is vice-chairman of the Economic Policy Committee of the State Duma of Russia.
					 The delegation members paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for their undying contributions to the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Russia. 
					
					 They made bows to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who lie in state at the immortality halls. 
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls which house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The head of the delegation made an entry in the visitors' book.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation arrived here Saturday. It is led by Kazbek Taysaev, secretary of Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who is vice-chairman of the Economic Policy Committee of the State Duma of Russia.

articles.title: Hakdang-gol Revolutionary Site in DPRK
articles.content:
Hakdang-gol Revolutionary Site in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Hakdang-gol Revolutionary Site situated in the center of Pyongyang is associated with the exploits of indomitable revolutionary fighter Kim Hyong Jik, father of President Kim Il Sung. Service personnel, working people and school youth and children are visiting the site in an endless stream.  
					 There stands a monument "May Korean National Association Shine Long" at the site. 
					
					 In the 1910s Kim Hyong Jik made a scientific analysis of the then situation of the country and the anti-Japanese national liberation movement before setting forth the idea of "Jiwon," which calls for aiming high in order to drive out the Japanese imperialists and achieve the independence of the country by the efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					 Based on the above-said noble idea of continuous revolution, the patriotic idea, Kim Hyong Jik formed the Korean National Association with patriotic advocates of the independence movement in Hakdang-gol on March 23, Juche 6 (1917). 
					
					 The association was a revolutionary organization to unite all the anti-Japanese patriotic forces and lead in a unified way the national liberation movement across the country. 
					
					 The visitors bear in mind the truth that the idea of "Jiwon" has been steadily carried forward down through generations thanks to the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Many Works Made Public by Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Many Works Made Public by Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il made public a lot of works in those days of leading revolution, clearly clarifying tasks for carrying forward the revolutionary traditions of anti-Japanese struggle generation after generation and ways for doing so.
					 The works clarify the idea that the work of adhering to the Juche line and carrying it forward is a crucial matter that affects the destiny of the revolution and that it should be permanently held fast to by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They indicate the idea of sprucing up the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites as eternal treasures of the Korean revolution, centers for education in the revolutionary traditions.
					
					 They set forth principled issues arising in the work of creating literature and art pieces including the issue of adapting masterpieces created during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle for the screen, opera, drama and novel.
					
					 The works reflect the practical issues arising in learning from the revolutionary spirit of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 Reflected in the works are the idea of steadily glorifying the tradition of defending the leader unto death and further displaying the might of single-hearted unity and the idea of achieving the final victory of the revolution by constantly defending and carrying forward the great traditions created in the days of the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 The works serve as an eternal banner and guidelines of the life and struggle of the service personnel and people as their great traction and tremendous vitality have been clearly proved in the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Obstruction of Investigation into Spy Case under Fire
articles.content:
Obstruction of Investigation into Spy Case under Fire
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People carried an editorial "IS Openly Obstructs Investigation" on March 18. 
					 The editorial referred to the fact that a staff of the Intelligence Service (IS) arrested by the prosecution on charges of involvement in the fabrication of spy case is refuting the charge, laying a block in the way of investigation into the case. 
					
					 It said: IS staff members could express nothing without permission of their director when investigated by the prosecution on charges of committing crimes. 
					
					 The chief executive calls for "thorough investigation", while conniving at such behavior of the IS. It is an action deceiving the people. 
					
					 The more they drag out the time, the more the people will be convinced that the chief executive is an obstructer of investigation who conceals the truth.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Deplores Worship, Flunkeyism towards America
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Deplores Worship, Flunkeyism towards America
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Thursday in an editorial deplored south Korean society obsessed with worship and flunkeyism towards the U.S.
					 Now south Korean public harbors an illusion that the U.S. is an "advanced country," the editorial notes, urging it to make a cool judgment of whether the U.S. is an "advanced state", indeed. What idea do the rulers of this land have of the U.S. to which they look up as "an advanced state", it queried, and went on: 
					
					 One percent of the population holds 90 percent of GNP in the U.S. and 99 percent of them have the rest 10 percent of GNP. 
					
					 As a matter of fact, 400 plutocrats have more properties than those of 150 million Americans. 
					
					 This was the background against which anti-Wall Street demonstration was staged in September 2011 to accuse society "1:99".
					
					 This is the idea of the "advanced country" and the real picture of the country called the U.S., "founder of neo-liberalism". 
					
					 Tens of millions of Americans live in poverty owing to the bi-polarization of society caused by the privatization of healthcare based on American-style neo-liberalism which had been already declared bankrupt. 
					
					 However, the present regime is pushing forward its policy for privatization of healthcare, painting a wrong picture of the worst American-style healthcare system as advanced one. 
					
					 Now is the time for the regime to drop its illusion about the U.S. as "advanced state". 
					
					 How long will the regime play the role of a fool, keen on worship and flunkeyism to the U.S.?

articles.title: U.S. Army Chief of Staff's Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Army Chief of Staff's Remarks under Fire
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Referring to the issue of the Korean Peninsula, the chief of Staff of the U.S. Army said the greatest concern was potentiality of the outbreak of a war by misjudgment and the U.S. should do its best to prevent the war.
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. warmongers talked volubly as if they were concerned about the detente on the Korean Peninsula, however they could not cover their aggressive nature as an arch criminal straining the tension.
					
					 It is by no means accidental that the U.S. has staged Key Resolve and Foal Eagle military exercises every year irrespective of the trends of the situation.
					
					 The U.S. has cultivated and completed its operational ability through ceaseless joint exercises to promptly introduce the Army, Navy and Air forces and the Marines in the mainland and abroad into the peninsula and mount a coordinated attack upon the DPRK with south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is testing the operational effect of the "joint plan for coping with the provocation of a local war" and "tailored deterrence strategy" worked out with the south Korean authorities in the exercises.
					
					 This testifies to the fact that the exercises are offensive drills to invade the DPRK.
					
					 The situation on the peninsula has been driven to the brink of war more than once, but it did not develop into a war. This was thanks to the DPRK's endurance.
					
					 The DPRK will, in the future, too, keep its self-control and endurance to defend peace on the peninsula, but not overlook the provocation by the aggressors.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Syria
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Syria
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A Syrian preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed on Mar. 16.
					 The director of the Higher Education Department of the Regional Leadership of the Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to arrange diverse political and cultural events to celebrate the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Belarus
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Belarus
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Belarus on March 14.
					 L. Shukolinikov, chairman of the Permanent Committee of the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Republic of Slovenia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Republic of Slovenia
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed on Mar. 14.
					 Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to arrange diverse political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and feats of the President from Mar. 14 to Apr. 16.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Japan
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Japan
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The executive committee of Japan-DPRK Friendship Society for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in Tokyo on Mar. 10.
					 The committee consists of figures of political and social circles and those of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The committee discussed celebrating the Day of the Sun, the greatest holiday of the Korean people, in Japan.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Denounced by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Denounced by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Pakistan and Bangladesh issued statements on March 17 in support of the statement of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The Pakistan Labour Federation said:
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy aimed at stifling the DPRK and its moves pursuant to the policy have become serious.
					
					 We denounce the U.S. sanctions against the DPRK, its moves to isolate the DPRK and undisguised military threats toward the latter.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to roll back the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK before it is too late, have a correct viewpoint and attitude toward the DPRK's nuclear deterrence and stop at once its groundless "human rights" racket.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to halt its interference in the internal affairs of the DPRK, withdraw the U.S. forces from south Korea and disorganize the "UN Command".
					
					 We will always stand on the side of the Korean people who are struggling for the reunification of the country and lasting peace of the region.
					
					 The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said that the U.S. should make a decision to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and retract all the measures pursuant to the policy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de la banda Moranbong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de la banda Moranbong
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con Ri Sol Ju, presencio el dia 22 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la funcion de la Banda Moranbong.
					En la escena se pusieron el coro femenino "Jubilo del pueblo", el duo femenino y pangchang "Nuestro padre", el solo femenino y pangchang "Cancion de abundante pesca en el mar", la musica ligera "Huellas del soldado" y otras piezas.
					
					Las ejecutantes describieron en tono patetico las hazanas del Comandante Supremo quien conduce a la victoria la batalla de enfrentamiento antiyanqui y defiende el destino de la patria y la nacion.
					
					Demostraron sin reserva que en este mundo nadie puede detener el avance del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC porque cuentan con el potente ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu y el poderio de la unidad monolitica entre todos los militares y civiles.
					
					La funcion arranco efusivos aplausos de ellos espectadores.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Mariscal respondio cordialmente a las entusiastas aclamaciones de ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en verla Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Kim Yong Chol, Jo Kyong Chol, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Ki Nam, Pak To Chun, Kim Phyong Hae, Han Kwang Sang, Kim Kyong Ok, Ri Jae Il, Kim Pyong Ho, Kim Yo Jong, oficiales y soldados del EPC.
